blood.author: pseudonym
blood.post: What does Wikipedia say about this “archaeocryptography” or “archaeoperceptive cryptology”? “Archaeocryptography is not a recognized branch of Archeology or academic discipline. It is an example of pseudoscience or pseudoarchaeology that relies heavily upon predetermined calculations, and alleged evidence.”What could we then infer about professorships and attainments, if, once again, it’s “not a recognized branch of Archaeology or academic discipline”.  Hmm…
blood.title: Stigmata and the Shroud of Turin
